tool_description: This API generate cryptographically random strong password which are nearly impossible to break
name: Password Generator API
title: Password Generator API

api_list.name: Password of length 50
Base
api_list.description: Only this endpoint is currently supported which gives you a random password
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://password-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://password-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
